alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Waushara; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Calumet, Winnebago and southeastern Waushara Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1259 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Poygan to near Green Lake. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rush Lake around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Oshkosh and Northern Lake Winnebago. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
